rows.label: qst200908_msg001
rows.name: Are you alright?

rows.label: qst200908_msg002
rows.name: Hah~ I-I'm saved, mo~

rows.label: qst200908_msg003
rows.name: Well then, Kupon will be on his way...

rows.label: qst200908_msg004
rows.name: Please wait a moment!

rows.label: qst200908_msg005
rows.name: Kupon-san, you know me, don't you?

rows.label: qst200908_msg007
rows.name:
I-I don't know you, mo! I don't
even want to remember you, mo!

rows.label: qst200908_msg008
rows.name:
"Don't want to remember"
means you do know me...

rows.label: qst200908_msg009
rows.name:
I don't really get it, but he's
panicking and not making sense...

rows.label: qst200908_msg010
rows.name:
Did something happen
between us in the past?

rows.label: qst200908_msg039
rows.name:
It seems scary if I don't
confess, so I'll tell you, mo.

rows.label: qst200908_msg011
rows.name: ...It was 20 years ago, mo.

rows.label: qst200908_msg012
rows.name:
Kupon met Kasane and her Driver
for a business deal, mo.

rows.label: qst200908_msg013
rows.name: Did something happen during that deal?

rows.label: qst200908_msg014
rows.name: No, the deal itself went smoothly, mo.

rows.label: qst200908_msg015
rows.name:
The problem was on the way
back... it happened right
after I parted with them, mo.

rows.label: qst200908_msg016
rows.name:
I was crushed by a rolling boulder,
and when I got out, the ground collapsed
and I fell into the Cloud Sea...

rows.label: qst200908_msg017
rows.name:
Just when I thought I finally reached land
from the Cloud Sea, it turned out to be a
monster's nest, a total disaster, mo!

rows.label: qst200908_msg018
rows.name: Th-that's...

rows.label: qst200908_msg019
rows.name: Quite a calamity...

rows.label: qst200908_msg020
rows.name:
You poor thing, Kupon-san.
You had such bad luck...

rows.label: qst200908_msg021
rows.name: But it's alright now!

rows.label: qst200908_msg022
rows.name:
Since you've met me again, full of
happiness, lots of good fortune
will come your way from now on!

rows.label: qst200908_msg026
rows.name:
Um... There was something
else I wanted to ask.

rows.label: qst200908_msg027
rows.name:
Have you seen Otto-san? He
was apparently heading to
the Nocclia Timber Site...

rows.label: qst200908_msg028
rows.name:
...I know Otto, mo. We even
exchanged a brief greeting, mo.

rows.label: qst200908_msg029
rows.name: Really?!

rows.label: qst200908_msg030
rows.name:
But right after we parted,
he was captured by the Tirkin
tribe and taken away, mo.

rows.label: qst200908_msg040
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst200908_msg041
rows.name: That's a serious matter!

rows.label: qst200908_msg031
rows.name:
He must be held captive in
the Tirkin territory near
Twin Trunks Hill, mo.

rows.label: qst200908_msg032
rows.name:
I never thought the Tirkin
tribe would come all the
way out here, mo...

rows.label: qst200908_msg033
rows.name:
It's gotten dangerous
around here lately, mo...

rows.label: qst200908_msg034
rows.name:
Anyway, are you done with your
questions, mo? Kupon will be
taking his leave now, mo!

rows.label: qst200908_msg035
rows.name:
To think he was abducted
by the Tirkin tribe...

rows.label: qst200908_msg036
rows.name: Let's hurry and rescue Otto-san!
